snippet: The Philharmonie de Paris, a new concert hall, is part of a complex that officials hope will lure patrons away from their usual cultural haunts.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini Critic's Notebook; opening day of Philharmonie de Paris concert hall succeeds in drawing diverse crowd with day of free concerts, classes and workshops; hope is that new home of Orchestre de Paris, unconventionally located closer to working-class suburbs than city center, will attract new audiences to classical music.
lead_paragraph: The Philharmonie de Paris, a new concert hall, is part of a complex that officials hope will lure patrons away from their usual cultural haunts.

headline.print_headline: In Paris, a New Music Hub Hums
headline.main: In Paris, a New Music Hub Hums
